content.intro: These terms and conditions govern the relationship between Pohřební věnce s.r.o. and customers when purchasing funeral wreaths and related services.
content.services: We provide services for the production and delivery of funeral wreaths, floral arrangements and related products for funeral services.
content.orders: Orders are accepted through our web interface or by phone. Each order is confirmed by email.
content.payment: We accept card payments, bank transfers or through GoPay and Stripe payment gateways.
content.delivery: We provide delivery through our own transport or through contractual partners. Standard delivery time is 24-48 hours.
content.returns: Due to the nature of the products (fresh flowers), we do not accept returns, except in cases of defective performance on our part.

content.intro: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data in accordance with GDPR and Czech laws.
content.collection: We only collect data necessary to process your order: name, address, phone, email and payment information.
content.usage: We use your data exclusively to process orders, communicate and improve our services.
content.sharing: We do not share data with third parties except in necessary cases (shipping, payments).
content.security: We use modern security measures to protect your data including encryption and secure servers.
content.rights: You have the right to access, correct, delete or transfer your data. Contact us at info@pohrebni-vence.cz.

content.intro: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:
content.rights: Right to information, access, correction, deletion, restriction of processing, data portability and objection to processing.
content.access: You can request a copy of all data we process about you.
content.deletion: You can request deletion of your data if it is no longer needed for the original purpose.
content.contact: To exercise your rights, contact us at info@pohrebni-vence.cz or in writing to our address.

content.intro: Our website uses cookies to ensure proper functionality and improve user experience.
content.types: We use technical cookies (necessary), analytical cookies (Google Analytics) and marketing cookies.
content.management: You can manage cookies in your browser settings or through our consent management tool.
content.thirdParty: Some cookies come from third parties (Google, Facebook) for analytical and marketing purposes.

openGraph.title: FAQ | Everything You Need to Know About Funeral Wreaths
openGraph.description: Practical advice and answers to the most common questions about funeral wreaths, their storage and care.

items.question: How to properly store and care for a funeral wreath?
items.answer: If you wish to have the wreath delivered a day or two before the ceremony, we recommend keeping it horizontally in the original box. This ensures that water from the wreath base doesn't drain out. No additional care is needed – the wreath is sufficiently saturated with water and the flowers are treated for maximum longevity.

items.question: How long will the flowers in a funeral wreath stay fresh?
items.answer: The longevity of flowers depends on weather conditions. Generally, the shorter the stem, the longer the durability. Funeral wreaths are intended for display at memorial sites. In summer with high temperatures, the wreath will remain beautiful for one week, while in cooler weather it can last up to two weeks.

items.question: What to do with the wreath after the flowers wilt?
items.answer: We recommend ecological recycling. Dispose of the flowers from the wreath in the collection bin designated for bio waste and the wreath base in plastic recycling. Together we protect nature and ensure responsible handling of materials.

about.title: About Our Floral Workshop
about.mission: We help families express love and respect for their loved ones through beautiful floral arrangements in life's most difficult moments.
about.story: We are a small family floral workshop that approaches our work with sensitivity and attention to every detail. We have been dedicated to flowers for many years and believe that the sphere of funeral flowers deserves more attention and beauty. We put a piece of our heart into each of your orders, so that this sad event in your lives becomes at least a little more pleasant.
about.values: We select each flower with care so that the result of our work meets all your expectations. We always buy flowers fresh, carefully clean and treat them so that they honor the memory of your loved one at the memorial site for as long as possible.
about.commitment: Our commitment is to provide not only beautiful floral arrangements, but also understanding, empathy, and support in difficult times. We believe that quality handwork and personal approach can bring comfort and dignity to the farewell process.
